description: This file initializes a PDF knowledge base, sets up an agent with this knowledge, and runs a query asynchronously to generate a response about Thai curry.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base to generate responses.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads and manages PDF documents for querying.

classes.name: PDFReader
classes.description: A PDF reader that processes PDF files, possibly in chunks.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A vector database client used for storing and retrieving vector embeddings.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads or reloads the PDF knowledge base, with an option to recreate the index.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response to a query, with optional markdown formatting.

calls: asyncio.run(agent.aprint_response("How to make Thai curry?", markdown=True))
